channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Life Kit's guide to a successful Dry January
item.description: It is officially 2025 and 'Life Kit' is kicking the year off with a series to help people complete Dry January successfully. And, a look ahead for this year from pop culture to politics.
item.content:encoded:
'/>

It is officially 2025 and 'Life Kit' is kicking the year off with a series to help people complete Dry January successfully. And, a look ahead for this year from pop culture to politics.

(Image credit: Photo illustration by Beck Harlan)
item.dc:creator: Brittney Melton

item.title: Ukraine halts transit of Russian gas to Europe after a prewar deal expired
item.description: Among the hardest-hit will be Moldova, which has brought in emergency measures as residents brace for a harsh winter and looming power cuts.
item.content:encoded:
Among the hardest-hit will be Moldova, which has brought in emergency measures as residents brace for a harsh winter and looming power cuts.

(Image credit: Dmitri Lovetsky)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Aztec Rebels: La travesía de un club de motociclistas Latinos encontrando un hogar en el Bronx
item.description: Los Aztec Rebels son un club de motociclistas con sede en el sur del Bronx, donde Eddie Lucero, el presidente del club, dice que puedes ser un hombre de familia y un líder en tu comunidad.
item.content:encoded:
Los Aztec Rebels son un club de motociclistas con sede en el sur del Bronx, donde Eddie Lucero, el presidente del club, dice que puedes ser un hombre de familia y un líder en tu comunidad.

(Image credit: Mayolo López Gutiérrez)
item.dc:creator: Mayolo López Gutiérrez

item.title: Look up! Here's what's to watch for in space in 2025
item.description: In the New Year, there will be supermoons, meteor showers and other exciting celestial events.
item.content:encoded:
In the New Year, there will be supermoons, meteor showers and other exciting celestial events.

(Image credit: Bill Ingalls/NASA)
item.dc:creator: Chandelis Duster

item.title: New Year's resolution ideas: 25 fun and practical goals to reach for in 2025
item.description: Can't think of a good New Year's resolution? We've got suggestions. Whether it's to stay out of debt or get your first tattoo, our expert guides can help make your goals a reality.
item.content:encoded: Can't think of a good New Year's resolution? We've got suggestions. Whether it's to stay out of debt or get your first tattoo, our expert guides can help make your goals a reality.
item.dc:creator: Malaka Gharib

item.title: A look at the Aztec Rebels, a family-oriented motorcycle club based in the Bronx
item.description: The Aztec Rebels are a motorcycle club based out of the South Bronx where Eddie Lucero, the club's president, says you can be a family man and a leader in your community.
item.content:encoded:
The Aztec Rebels are a motorcycle club based out of the South Bronx where Eddie Lucero, the club's president, says you can be a family man and a leader in your community.

(Image credit: Mayolo López Gutiérrez)
item.dc:creator: Mayolo López Gutiérrez

item.title: Blake Lively sues 'It Ends With Us' director Justin Baldoni alleging harassment
item.description: Blake Lively sued "It Ends With Us" director Justin Baldoni and several others tied to the romantic drama, alleging harassment and a coordinated campaign to attack her reputation.
item.content:encoded:
Blake Lively sued "It Ends With Us" director Justin Baldoni and several others tied to the romantic drama, alleging harassment and a coordinated campaign to attack her reputation.

(Image credit: Evan Agostini)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Why So Many Birthdays on This Particular Day?
item.description: For most western countries January first is a holiday. In Afghanistan and Pakistan it is the date of many, many birthdays. We find out why.
item.content:encoded: For most western countries January first is a holiday. In Afghanistan and Pakistan it is the date of many, many birthdays. We find out why.
item.dc:creator: Diaa Hadid

item.title: Outgoing North Carolina governor commutes 15 death row sentences
item.description: Before Tuesday, North Carolina had 136 offenders on death row, among the top 5 largest death rows in the U.S. Gov. Roy Cooper's office said it had received clemency petitions from 89 of them.
item.content:encoded:
Before Tuesday, North Carolina had 136 offenders on death row, among the top 5 largest death rows in the U.S. Gov. Roy Cooper's office said it had received clemency petitions from 89 of them.

(Image credit: Evan Vucci)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Blake Lively inspires more actresses to speak out against Hollywood toxicity
item.description: In the wake of Blake Lively's sexual harassment and retaliation allegations against co-star Justin Baldoni, more actresses are speaking up about their own similar experiences on set.
item.content:encoded: In the wake of Blake Lively's sexual harassment and retaliation allegations against co-star Justin Baldoni, more actresses are speaking up about their own similar experiences on set.
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman
